code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const[cryptos,setCryptos]=useState([]);const API_URL='https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/markets?vs_currency=usd&order=market_cap_desc&per_page=10&page=1&sparkline=false';useEffect(()=>{fetch(API_URL).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setCryptos(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error al cargar criptomonedas:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Mercado de Criptomonedas"}),cryptos.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Cargando datos..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"crypto-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Nombre"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Precio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Capitalizaci\xF3n"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:cryptos.map(crypto=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:crypto.image,alt:crypto.name,width:"40"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:crypto.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:["$",crypto.current_price.toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:["$",crypto.market_cap.toLocaleString()]})]},crypto.id))})]})]});};export default Home;
